channel.title: Projects on Francis Beauchamp
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Francis Beauchamp

item.title: Slash - An Unreal Engine 5 experiment
item.description: Wanting to learn Unreal Engine 5, I set out to follow this course from Stephen Ulibarri which covers a lot of topics. I ended up falling into many rabbit holes, adding many little details that were not covered by the lectures.

item.title: SwiftTracer - A physically based rendering engine
item.description: SwiftTracer is a Swift implementation of a physically based rendering engine inspired by PBRT, Mitsuba and many other contributors. It was built to support my research efforts as part of my master’s degree. The engine currently supports several image formats like png, jpg, pfm and exr. See for yourself on github.
